snippet.title: Espire 2 - Mixed Reality Update Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Check out the trailer for the free Mixed Reality update coming to Espire 2: Stealth Operatives for the Meta Quest 2, 3 and pro. Featuring intense stealth action that takes place in your own home via mixed reality.
